item.description:
Join me at the trail for a Saturday morning run. I'll be going long (12 miles) in preparation for my 1/2 marathon the following weekend. But the beauty of running on the trail is that you can turn around whenever you like. PLEASE NOTE the starting time (a bit earlier than we usually run on Sundays).

If there is enough interest, I may schedule additional Saturdays this fall. So if you can't make this week but are interested in general, please let me know.
item.name: Saturday morning run - Farmington Canal trail
